name: Riven: The Sequel to Myst
description:
This script will facilitate you install "Riven - The Sequel to Myst" on Linux OS.
It is only compatible with GOG edition and uses Lutris ScummVM runner. 
During install please let all options by default.
Thanks to the people who helped us play this game in the best conditions on Linux platform.
notes:
- Multilanguage: you could choose your preferred game language during install between english (default), french, german, polish, spanish, italian, japanese and russian.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

script.custom-name: Riven - The Sequel to Myst - GOG - ScummVM

files.gogsetup: N/A:Please select Windows setup exe file downloaded from your GOG account.

content:
custom-name: Riven - The Sequel to Myst - GOG - ScummVM
files:
- inno: http://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/snapshots/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
- gogsetup: N/A:Please select Windows setup exe file downloaded from your GOG account.
game:
  args: --language=$INPUT_LANG
  game_id: riven
  path: $GAMEDIR/app
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/innoextract
    file: inno
- execute:
    args: --extract $gogsetup --output-dir "$GAMEDIR/"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract/innoextract
- input_menu:
    description: 'Choose your preferred game''s language:'
    id: LANG
    options:
    - en: English
    - fr: French
    - de: German
    - pl: Polish
    - es: Spanish
    - it: Italian
    - jp: Japanese
    - ru: Russian
    preselect: en
scummvm:
  aspect: true
  fullscreen: true
